channel.title: Notes on radu's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on radu's blog

item.title: Trying something new
item.author: radu@matei.ai (Radu Matei)
item.description: I’ve been writing on this blog since 2016. I’ve written about .NET, WebSockets, debugging microservices on Kubernetes, or about WebAssembly memory. I rarely have the time to write lengthy blog posts anymore, and social media seems to be the worst place to have a conversation these days; so I stopped posting almost entirely. I’m trying to change that with a new notes section of my blog where I’m trying to write more by sharing something in-between a tweet and a fully fledged blog post.
